para1: The BVA National Beach Team program develops Bermuda's top beach volleyball players for international competition. The program operates four training groups covering both senior and under-19 levels for men and women.
para2: Beach volleyball is one of the most iconic sports in Bermuda â€” played on the island's famous pink sand beaches and in international arenas. The national beach program connects Bermuda's beach culture with the global game.
para3: Selection to the national beach team requires active BVA membership, consistent participation in the Summer Beach League, and demonstrated skill at the national level.
